2.0.8.en: Moved installation instructions from app store to community support topic.

2.1.1.en: Add SSL (https) support for Sonarr, Radarr or Lidarr installations. Re-pair or edit device settings to enable.

3.0.0.en: Update to SDK3 (requires Homey firmware 5.x) and minor improvements.
